EmailTemplate.subject: Melbourne Breakfast Invite: Modernise Your Application Portfolio
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I thought you might be interested in the upcoming event: Driving Innovation with Application Transformation
Join us for breakfast with your industry peers and our newly appointed Chief Technology Officer APJ, Lawrence Crowther, as we discuss how organisations can transform their legacy applications and business processes in order to accelerate their digital transformation journey and improve time, cost and operational efficiencies - while maintaining security and compliance.
Date: Tuesday, 2nd April 2019 Time: 8:30am - 10:15am (registration opens from 8am) Location: TEA ROOM, Adjacent Melbourne Supper Club, Level 1/161 Spring St, Melbourne VIC 3000
Register: https://connect.pivotal.io/Melbourne-Breakfast-April19.html
Featured Speakers: - Lawrence Crowther, CTO APJ, Pivotal - Anthony Clarke, AVP & Country Manager ANZ, Pivotal - Ramy El Essawy, Senior Platform Architect, Pivotal
Agenda:
8:00am Registration 8:30am Opening Remarks, Anthony Clarke, AVP & Country Manager ANZ, Pivotal 8:40am Why Your Organisation Needs Application Transformation, Lawrence Crowther, CTO APJ, Pivotal 9:10am AppTx Principles: How to Modernise Your Application Portfolio, Ramy El Essawy, Senior Platform Architect, Pivotal 9:40am Breakfast Served & Roundtable Discussion 10:05am Closing Remarks 10:15am Event Closure
Should you not be able to attend our Melbourne event, join us at the Sydney breakfast on 27th March: https://connect.pivotal.io/Sydney-Breakfast-March19.html
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
